chainstack_testnet.name: Chainstack Testnet
chainstack_testnet.description: Chainstack testnet API - 25 RPS free plan

toncenter_testnet.name: TON Center Testnet
toncenter_testnet.description: Official TON Center testnet - 10 RPS with API key, 1 RPS without

toncenter_mainnet.name: TON Center Mainnet
toncenter_mainnet.description: Official TON Center mainnet - 10 RPS with API key, 1 RPS without

quicknode_mainnet.name: QuickNode Mainnet
quicknode_mainnet.description: QuickNode mainnet - 15 RPS free plan. Endpoint automatically appends /jsonRPC for JSON-RPC requests.

getblock_mainnet.name: GetBlock Mainnet
getblock_mainnet.description: GetBlock mainnet API - 20 RPS. Endpoint automatically appends /jsonRPC for JSON-RPC requests.

onfinality_testnet.name: OnFinality Testnet
onfinality_testnet.description: OnFinality testnet - 4 RPS free tier. Uses /rpc endpoint with API key in header (apikey header). If no API key is set, falls back to /public endpoint (rate-limited). Query params in URL are automatically removed.

tatum_testnet.name: Tatum Testnet
tatum_testnet.description: Tatum testnet gateway - 3 RPS free plan. Endpoint automatically appends /jsonRPC. Requires x-api-key header with TATUM_API_KEY_TESTNET. Not compatible with browser due to CORS restrictions.

tatum_mainnet.name: Tatum Mainnet
tatum_mainnet.description: Tatum mainnet gateway - 3 RPS free plan. Endpoint automatically appends /jsonRPC. Requires x-api-key header with TATUM_API_KEY_MAINNET. Not compatible with browser due to CORS restrictions.

orbs_testnet.name: Orbs TON Access Testnet
orbs_testnet.description: Orbs decentralized gateway - no hard limit, uses dynamic discovery

orbs_mainnet.name: Orbs TON Access Mainnet
orbs_mainnet.description: Orbs decentralized gateway - no hard limit, uses dynamic discovery
